cards.title: CodingFest
cards.description: Testing of Analytic skills and to be a faster code challenger.

cards.title: First National Exhibition on General Ethics and Life Science
cards.description: Have a look at on General Science like various laws of Indian Constituition and other Nations, Amazing Facts and more stalls for ethics of Human Life Science

cards.title: National Level Technical Symposium
cards.topic: Technical Quiz, Paper Presentation and Project Presentation
cards.description:
i) MCQs on algorithms and brain-analytic quizzes on basics of Programming languages. 
 ii) Presentation is welcomed from aspirants having knowledge on latest Technologies. 
 iii) Have a great chnace to explore your knowledge and to be a inventor.

cards.title: Hardware Exhibition
cards.description: Have a great knowledge in electronic field and to make a circuit board and to debug.

cards.title: Technical Workshop & Conference on Software Defined Networking(SDN)
cards.description:
Workshop on Creative design of circuit related things and advanced machinaries design using AutoCAD & MATLAB.' + '
' + 'Conference conducted by experienced Instrialists people detailed report on advanced Mobile Networks and Get a clear knowledge on basics, working of SDN and its impact in future.

cards.title: World Political Science Exhibition
cards.topic: Books, Journals, Biographies of Various Leaders
cards.description:
History of World Political Science and Reformation of Modern Politics.. 
 Biographies and Life Histories of various Leaders who sacrifice their life for Welfare of People

cards.title: Non-Technical(Cultural) Event
cards.description: All cultural events like Singing, Dance, MIME etc., and non-cultural events like ShortFilm Making, Photography Contest etc.,

cards.title: National Level Space Expo
cards.topic: Satellite Models, Engines, list of satellites launched by ISRO
cards.description:
Conference on Historical Moments of Space Science and various Models of Space Vehicles and its Engines, 
 Satellites launched by various nations 
 Smart Preview of Future Missions by ISRO
